title: Case-Based General Chemistry Lab Education Improvement Program for Social Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Chemistry Concepts and Laboratory Equipment Handling Experience
context.additional_context: A program designed for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to strengthen chemical analysis competencies for application in field operations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform phosphate analysis using a spectrophotometer
Learners can write laboratory reports according to standard templates and improve them through peer evaluation
Learners can explain chemical experiment results by connecting them to their specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
